member.name: IMFDXGIBuffer.GetResource
member.summary: Queries the Microsoft DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI)surface for an interface.
member.param: The interface identifier (IID) of the interface being requested.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The object does not support the specified interface.

member.name: IMFDXGIBuffer.GetSubresourceIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the subresource that is associated with this media buffer.
member.param: Receives the zero-based index of the subresource.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFDXGIBuffer.GetUnknown
member.summary: Gets an pointer that was previously stored in the media buffer object.
member.param: The interface identifier (IID) of the interface being requested.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The object does not support the specified interface.
The specified key was not found.

member.name: IMFDXGIBuffer.SetUnknown
member.summary: Stores an arbitrary pointer in the media buffer object.
member.param: The identifier for the pointer. This identifier is used as a key to retrieve the value. It can be any GUID value.
A pointer to the interface. Set this parameter to NULL to clear a pointer that was previously set.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: An item already exists with this key.

member.name: IMFDXGIBuffer
member.summary: Represents a buffer that contains a Microsoft DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI)surface.
